descript.abstract: Source: https://www12.statcan.gc.ca/census-recensement/2021/dp-pd/prof/index.cfm?Lang=ECollections Date: 10/17/25CRS: NAD 1983 CSRS UTM Zone 11NProcessing steps: N/AAttribute Definitions: COMMUNITY_ABRV: abbreviated community nameCOMMUNITY_FULL: full community nameDA_AREA_m2: area of dissemination area in meters squaredGlobal_ID: ID assigned to community by 2021 Census
descript.purpose: Description of populations and dwellings by community
